channel.title: Hive Hand Tips?
channel.description:
Hi, everyone. During my first playthrough of BM, I never really understood how to use the hive hand. Then, I saw the alien grunts use it, and I had no idea how they could use it so effectively.
Any tips/strategies with using it?

It’s also very effective against black ops (you’ll only encounter them once after getting this weapon ;/) because they move quickly and the hornets can track them.

item.title: Hive Hand Tips?
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
In fact, in the latter half of the game, I essentially used only the hivehand. I spammed it before entering an area until I saw that the bees started flying randomly instead of zoning in on a specific area-- with this tactic, I never even encountered a live assassin, and managed to slaughter tons of soldiers before they even realize I’m there.

Perhaps that was me taking advantage of that weapon, but regardless, it simplified the game for me considerably.

Read full topic

item.title: Hive Hand Tips?
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
Use it against the assassins. Its movement following capabilities is a god send for them since they like being so twitchy.

Read full topic

item.title: Hive Hand Tips?
item.dc:creator: Mr.Francis
item.description:
It’s perfect for when you want to conserve ammo. You can use it to safely kill headcrabs and barnacles. You can use it as an enemy detector; if you suspect that there are enemies around the corner or in the next area, you can fire a few shots and the thornets will zip towards whatever threat lies ahead.

Read full topic

item.title: Hive Hand Tips?
item.dc:creator: nothing
item.description:
Don’t forget: Its always better to shoot it empty. Then wait(!) till it is full to shoot again. This way, you get more bees on the way than with continuous shooting.

item.dc:creator: Sephiroth
item.description:
xat:

Use it to sniff out HECU before entering an area. You can clear entire rooms doing this without even having to enter them - HECU will die before they can get to you.

Use it as an ammo conserving way of killing barnacles (just right click spam them).
